contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Taiwan station |name = 新埔站 |nameeng = Xinpu Station |image = Platform in Xinpu MRT Station.JPG |imagesize = 250px |caption = Xinpu Station platform |municipality = New Taipei |district = Banqiao |address = B1F, No. 2, Sec. 3, Minsheng Rd. |type = Underground |open = August 31, 2000 |banqiao = 3 |operator = Taipei Rapid Transit System |ridership = {{TRTS ridership|station=Xinpu Station}}<br> {{TRTS ridership-rank|station=Xinpu Station}} |bus = y }} [[Taipei Rapid Transit System|Taipei Metro]] '''Xinpu Station''' is a station on the [[Banqiao Line (TRTS)|Banqiao Line]] located in [[Banqiao District]], [[New Taipei City]], [[Taiwan]]. ==Station overview== [[Image:Xinpu-Station.JPG|thumb|250px|right|Xinpu Station platform level.]] [[Image:Xinpu Station Exit5a.jpg|thumb|250px|right|Xinpu Station Exit 5.]] This two-level, underground station has an [[island platform]] and four exits.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://web.trtc.com.tw/e/stationdetail.asp?ID=083|title=Route Map: Xinpu|publisher=Taipei Rapid Transit Corporation|accessdate=2010-06-20}}</ref> It is 250 meters away from the planned Xinpu Minsheng Station of the [[Circular Line (TRTS)|Circular Line]], scheduled to open in 2015. ===History=== *August 31, 2000: Opened for service with the opening of the segment between [[Jiangzicui Station|Jiangzicul]] and Xinpu. *May 31, 2006: Service is extended through to [[Fuzhong Station|Fuzhong]], thus joining with the [[Tucheng Line (TRTS)|Tucheng Line]]. ==Station layout== {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=50 valign=top|'''L1''' |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100 valign=top|Street Level |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=420 valign=top|Exit/ Entrance |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=50 valign=top|'''B1''' |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100 valign=top|Concourse |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=420 valign=top|Lobby, toilets, one-way ticket machine, information desk<br>Restrooms <small>(North side, outside fare zone near Exits 4 and 5)</small> |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" rowspan=3 valign=top|'''B2''' |Platform <span style="color:#{{TRTS color|Blue}};">'''1'''</span> |← {{Banqiao Line}} towards [[{{S-line/TRTS right/Blue}} Station|{{S-line/TRTS right/Blue}}]] <small>([[Jiangzicui Station|Jiangzicui]])</small> |- |style="border-top:solid 2px black;border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 2px black;" colspan=2|<center><small>[[Island platform]], Doors will open on the left</small></center> |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Platform <span style="color:#{{TRTS color|Blue}};">'''2'''</span> |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|<span style="color:white;">→</span> {{Banqiao Line}} towards [[{{S-line/TRTS left/Blue}} Station|{{S-line/TRTS left/Blue}}]] <small>([[Banqiao Station|Banqiao]])</small> →<br /><span style="color:white;">→</span> {{Banqiao Line}} Arrival Platform（Use Not Arrival）</small>→ |} ===Exits=== *'''Exit 1:''' Intersection of Wenhua Rd. Sec. 1 and Minsheng Rd. Sec. 3, beside the Xinpu Market *'''Exit 2:''' Intersection of Wenhua Rd. Sec. 1 and Minsheng Rd. Sec. 2, beside the Forward Hotel *'''Exit 3:''' Intersection of Wenhua Rd. Sec. 2 and Minsheng Rd. 2, beside the King building *'''Exit 4:''' Intersection of Wenhua Rd. Sec. 2 and Minsheng Rd. Sec. 2 *'''Exit 5:''' Intersection of Wenhua Rd. Sec. 2 and Minsheng Rd. Sec. 3, beside the Far Eastern International Bank [[File:Accessibility-directory.svg|20px|Accessibility Elevator.]] ==Around the station== *[[Chihlee Institute of Technology]] *Banciao Weekend Flower Market *New Taipei City Arts Center *Xinpu Market *New Taipei City Council (between this station and [[Jiangzicui Station]]) *New Taipei City Library *Xinpu Elementary School *Juguang Elementary School *Jiangcui Junior High School *Zhongshan Junior High School *Siwei Park *Zhuangjing Park *Huajiang Park *[[Provincial Highway No. 3 (Taiwan)|Provincial Highway No. 3]] *[[Provincial Highway No. 64 (Taiwan)|Provincial Highway No. 64]] {{S-rail-start}} {{S-rail|title=TRTS}} {{S-line|system=TRTS|line=Blue|notemid=[[Banqiao Line (TRTS)|Banqiao Line]]|previous=Banqiao|next=Jiangzicui}} {{End}} ==References== {{commons category|Xinpu Station}} {{Reflist}} {{TRTS Blue Line}} {{coord missing|Taiwan}} [[Category:Railway stations opened in 2000]] [[Category:Taipei Metro stations in New Taipei]] {{Taiwan-metro-stub}}
